cards.name: The Knight
cards.text: Forced Reaction: After an opponent wins a [power] challenge against you, that opponent takes control of The Knight. +1 STR [power]

cards.name: Captain of the Iron Fleet
cards.text: Forced Reaction: After an opponent wins a [military] challenge against you, that opponent takes control of Captain of the Iron Fleet. +1 STR [military]

cards.name: The Reader
cards.text: Forced Reaction: After an opponent wins a [intrigue] challenge against you, that opponent takes control of The Reader. +1 STR [intrigue]

cards.name: Priest of the Drowned God
cards.text: Each gold in your gold pool contributes 1 additional STR to your total for dominance. Forced Reaction: After an opponent wins dominance, that opponent takes control of Priest of the Drowned God.

cards.name: Heir to the Iron Islands
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a unopposed challenge, gain 1 power for your faction. Forced Reaction: After an opponent wins an unopposed challenge against you, that opponent takes control of Heir to the Iron Islands.

cards.name: Pirate Marauder
cards.text: Reaction: After you win initiative, gain 2 gold. Forced Reaction: After an opponent wins initiative, that opponent takes control of Pirate Marauder.

cards.name: Reek
cards.text: Forced Reaction: After a player loses a challenge by 5 or more STR, that player takes control of Reek. -1 Income. -1 Initiative.

cards.name: Lord Reaper of Pyke
cards.text: Forced Interrupt: When a player's power total reaches 15, that player takes control of Lord Reaper of Pyke.
